articles.content:
St George Illawarra jumped over the Titans and out of last place with their first win of the season last round.

articles.description: All the official charges for the NRL match review committee for round five.
articles.content:
Cowboys rookie Tom Gilbert is facing a four-week ban after being charged for making dangerous contact in Friday's loss to the Warriors.
